about_the_game:
Doppel Hunter is a party game for 2-8 players involving hiding amongst copies of yourself called "Doppels" and outsmarting other players. Break out the drinks and snacks as you compete with your friends in a hilarious game full of action, deception, and chaos.

How to play

  • Choose between various characters, each with their unique personalities



  • Select an ability to augment your character such as dash, partial invisibility, creating doppels, landmines, etc.



  • Spawn into a variety of different maps with the other players. Put on your "act-casual-hat" as you cleverly hide in plain sight amongst the doppels that spawn with you (use of sneaky trickery fully endorsed... win by any means necessary).
  • Every round random new game modifiers and events are applied making each round unique

More Info

---Character Abilities---
These are selected at the beginning of the map. There are pickups that spawn periodically during a game that will continually upgrade your character's ability for the round.

---Game Events and Modifiers---
There is an ever-expanding pool of "Events" or general game "modifiers" that have a chance to be applied to each round. There could be one or more randomly chosen to apply to the next round. A perfect opportunity for plenty of secrets and easter eggs to discover.

---Tribute to the Doppels---
Meet your everyday average doppel. Take a moment to sympathize with them. Just trying to mind their own business, brainlessly wandering indefinitely around the map. That's all they want to do and players keep running around acting like they own the place. So underappreciated... Doppels, we thank you for your sacrifice.

name: Doppel Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64bit
  • Processor: INTEL i3-4330
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: INTED HD Graphics 4600
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Blend in, hunt, and outsmart your friends to be the last person standing. Find the real players among clones called "Doppels" to win. Experience random events that make each round unique. A hilarious local multiplayer challenge perfect for a party! 2-8 Players
